name: ActivityLog
description: Entity representing activity logs for tracking all system actions

entity_type.description: The name of the entity that was affected (e.g., Soldier, Weapon).

details.description: A human-readable summary of the activity.

user_full_name.description: Full name of the user who performed the action.

user_soldier_id.description: The Soldier ID of the user who performed the action, if applicable.

context.description: A JSON object containing detailed context about the event, such as data diffs or related item lists.

division_name.description: Division associated with the activity, if any.

soldier_id.description: The soldier ID associated with this activity, if applicable.
